documents.document:
Liberty X Nike Air Max 90 White Purple Floral Womens


Back in May we saw the Liberty X Nike Air Max 90 Purple “Sail”, and while today’s version sports the same textile design, the colorway is definitely not so soft. In fact, a dark imperial purple works the shoe’s upper, and is broken up with touches of white on the Nike swoosh, toe, ankle, inner lining, and tongue. Finishing off the look is a classic white midsole, which houses a Nike Air Max Shoes unit at the heel, and a black outsole. The collaboration between Liberty of London and Nike Sportswear continues to expand with a new design on the Nike Air Max 90. Made for the ladies, the new design in based in a red suede over the majority of the upper. The usual flowery Liberty print is set beneath the suede and is mixed with sail to bring out the details. Currently there is no official release date for this model, but stay close and we will let you know as soon as the nes hits our inbox. Liberty of London’s latest collection for Nike continues hitting stores this week, at least overseas. Swedish retailer SneakersNStuff.com is now stocking the Liberty x Nike Air Max 90 Shoes Sport Red/Sail, which sets red suede overlays against red-and-white floral printed inlays, which is further contrasted by white on the midsole and Swoosh. Having examined the Nike Air Max 90 portion of the 2012 Nike Sportswear x Liberty collection, we shift our focus to the always popular Air Max 90 silhouette. Similar to the FREE 5.0, the shoe carries a textile upper finished with the distinctive Lagos Laurel print in imperial purple. Other features include suede front overlay, off-white midsole and rubber gum outsole, plus white laces and leather Swoosh. A tan leather logo patch at the tongue finishes the look. Heritage and style collide in the latest Nike Sportswear summer footwear collection with Liberty. One of Nike’s most coveted collaborations, it will celebrate the legacy and evolution of the brand’s running innovations over four remarkable decades of style. Styles include the Cortez, Free 5.0 and Air Max 90.

Nike Air Max 90 Hyperfuse Premium Suede Volt


After debuting in a variety of OG-leaning, ‘dipped’ and otherwise totally new colorways last summer, the Air Max 90 Hyperfuse Suede Volt went AWOL right around the time CrookedTongues gave out their sick ‘Infrared’ F&Fs. Then about ten days ago, we got our first look at a few new pairs whose colors were more or less combined to create the Olympic Flag-styled Quickstrike pair soon to be joined by AM95BBs and AM2012s. And that’s not the only AM90 HYP set to hit retail with some friendly assistance, as the four ‘Suede Pack’ pairs will soon unleash their unique combo construction on the world in red, neon, blue or black. Along with the black/cool grey version we showed you a few weeks back, Nike’s new suede pack of Premium Hyperfuse Nike Air Max Shoes also consists of this volt/yellow-grey colourway which has started making its way to select Nike retailers. Today, this retro-runner appears in its latest form dubbed the Nike Air Max 90 Shoes Hyperfuse Premium Suede. This new rendition utilizes both suede and hyperfuse composite throughout the upper and can be found in eye catching base tones of Soar, Gym Red, Volt, and Black. Decked out in a Hyperfuse upper of white and Volt with grey accents on the overlays, the kicks see a grey suede mudguard alongside white lining, a white rubber outsole and addition Volt hits on the midsole, Max Air unit and laces. Volt turns up the sound on this loud pair of Nike Air Max 90 Hyperfuses. The shoe takes on the vintage Air Max look, but is complemented with a suede and Hyperfuse composite.

Nike Dunk High 2012 Hot Sale


Be true to your team in the Nike Dunk High (NFL New England Patriots) iD Shoe. A Nike Dunks exclusive, this classic includes the official team logo and is customizable with authentic team colors. Pair it with your team jersey for a bold head-to-toe look in the stands or wherever you choose to represent. The French denim concern’s last three sneaker collaborations have been teamups with Vans, but longtime Sneaker News readers will also remember that A.P.C. has teamed up with Nike Sportswear on multiple occasions. Jean Touitou’s universally respected label had focused its attention solely on the All Court lowtop in previous efforts, but these new drops instead switch to two slightly more modern classics. The A.P.C. x Nike Dunk High will release in two ‘dipped’ and one more (off-)white monochromatic style, all with dark gum soles and accompanied by an Air Max 1 in dark blues. The phrase ‘J-Pack’ has been tossed around a bit more liberally in recent years, but even with wacky colors the meaning remains the same: we’re talking about the OG Air Jordan 1 blocking pattern. The AJ1s share their sole with 1985?s other smash hit Swooshed basketballer, and while they’ve crossed paths over in the SB division, this is the first time Nike Sportswear will take a crack at combining ’85?s most influential hightops. The Nike Dunk High will release later this year in red/black and royal/black styles borrowed from the Air Jordan 1, though the addition of a snake-textured suede Swoosh sets these apart from all previous ‘J-Pack’ efforts. Have a closer look after the jump, let us know how these compare to the SBs and OG AJ1s as well as the other FW12 Dunks.

Women Nike Running Shoes 2012


Now with dynamic Flywire technology that hugs the foot and attaches to the laces for a personalized fit, the Nike LunarGlide+ 4 iD Running Shoe offers exceptional support and stability for your run. Customize your shoe with striking colors, one of two sockliners and a personal iD. Build a unique color combination with a solid color on the upper, or add a NIKEiD-exclusive fade for a faster, flashier look. A reflective one can help keep you visible in low light, but a solid color pops against the mesh. Customize your comfort with one of two sockliners. The responsive sockliner enables quick reactions, while the cushioned alternative makes for a plusher, softer ride Nike Running Shoes on the home stretch. The Nike Free Run 2 Shield women's running shoes are the closest thing to running barefoot. A comfortable, highly flexible shoe that trains your feet to be stronger. Designed with a full bootie, the Nike Free Run+ gives you a customized, barefoot-like feel during your run. The lightweight mesh upper features a seamless forefoot for exceptional comfort, and reflective panels for safer early moring or late night workouts. Sipes across the top of the midsole encourage toes to flex and grip naturally, which engage muscles normally neglected in traditional footwear. The shoe has deep flex grooves that enhance the foot's flexibility and stability. Nike+ ready. The Nike Air Max 2012 Women's Running Shoes should be a staple pair in your closet. These Women Nike Running Shoes lightweight running shoes sport a two-layer Hyperfuse upper that sits on top of a full-length Cushlon midsole and 360 degree Max Air unit. You're sure to feel the superior support and cushioning in these running shoes. Whether you run competitively or for pleasure, Women's Nike Running Shoes from us are with you every step of the way. Add maximum comfort and cushioning to your route with Nike running shoes for women. Shop online for the best Nike running shoes, in a variety of sizes, styles and colors.

Nike Kobe 2012 Shoes


If you've been a fan of the custom sneaker colorways being worn by Team USA in Barcelona this week, you'll be happy to know that three of the styles are currently being offered through NIKEiD. LeBron James' Hyperdunk+, Kobe Bryant's Zoom Kobe VII and Kevin Durant's Zoom KD IV each feature clean white uppers, obsidian details and red laces. The Hyperdunk+ features additional hits of red on the exposed Flywire threading along the side panel. When Nike Kobe Shoes Kobe Bryant took the floor this morning for Team USA's on-going prep work on the road to London, he was noticeably aggressive and focused. Even though he's the elder statesman of the team, he's clearly not ready yet to pass the torch to the league's next generation of stars. It immediately reminded me of the dynamic that made Monte Carlo practices so legendary and competitive for Magic Johnson and Michael Jordan. "The 80's are over," Jordan would often remind him. "It's the 90's now." Behind 24 points and 10 rebounds from Kevin Durant (in just 22 minutes), the US squad took care of business in their first exhbition outing with a 54-point win over the Dominican Republic. Yes, they won by 54 points. Things were competitive when the DR took a 4-2 lead early on, 2012 Nike Kobe 7 Shoes and then the game was entirely out of hand the rest of the way. The popular Zoom Kobe VII has been getting tons of love both on and off the court so far in 2012, and will likely continue to do so with this combination of grey, blue and hot pink bringing them to life. Cool grey is seen taking care of the upper on these, while white contrasts on the Swoosh and outsole. Thunder blue handles the laces and liner, while fireberry completes the look on the tongue liner and external heel counter. The Kobe VII FC Barcelona Pack features two different colorways modeled after past Barca team kits. Both feature the FC Barcelona crest on the inside of the tongue.

2012 Nike Basketball Shoes


A few new colorways of the Nike Air Solstice Premium have just been revealed today, getting ready for it’s massive return this month. Though not as sporty as it’s suede and mesh counterpart, the Premium version keeps the retro flair while rocking a smooth leather and suede upper. Available Nike Basketball Shoes in both Black and Grey, each one features a perforated toe box Swoosh, with Orange used for the lining and ankle collar. The Nike Air Solstice is making it’s return this year, coming in this fresh Blue, Grey and White colorway. Built from a mix of leather, suede and mesh, the low top trainer has a strong retro vibe with traditional Orange Nike branding on the heel. The Nike Hyperdunk 2012 is a popular choice on the court during the 2012 Olympic Games, and now a commemorative colorway is getting ready to be released. This “Gold Medal” Hyperdunk features a patriotic inspired colorway, starting off with a predominately White upper. Navy Blue is used as the accent color, with Red seen in the details. The Gold 2012 Nike Basketball Shoes Swoosh on the heel sets Team USA up for prevail, which so far looks like a guarantee. The latest Mache custom is definitely a dope one. He shows his support for soldiers hurt in combat on the Nike LeBron 9 “Wounded Warriors Project” Custom. the shoe features an amazing paint job, which is inspired by the war hawk style plane. The Nike LeBron 9 “Cool Grey” is used as a base, and also features blue and white colors, along with the prominent teeth design on the front. Named after the legendary University of Oregon track coach Bill Bowerman, the Nike Air Trainer 1 NRG “BB51? Pack is now hitting select retailers. Constructed from suede and high-grade leather, the shoe comes in a choice of black or off white, both of which feature a unique carbon woven knitted tongue. Both are finished off with “BB51 AIR” branding embossed on the heels, as well as laser etched details on the side panels. The Nike Air Foamposite Pro – Gym Green has been used as the base, and features a large Sole Swap logo on the back of the heel, while a green sole replaces the original translucent one, matching the already green accents seen throughout the design. These would definitely go great with some camouflage, as they’re pictured here together.

2012 Nike Basketball Shoes on sale


In the wee hours of the morning Sneaker News gave you a look at a visual rendering of an upcoming Air Jordan V release thought to be this year’s Air Jordan Doernbecher. While the Air Jordan V was thought to be the likely to be the model of choice for the November release of the Doernbecher Freestyle IX, it’s been noted by theclosetcollector, who Nike Basketball Shoes posted the Air Jordan V rendering and info, that the upcoming 2012 Doernbecher release looks to instead be the Air Jordan IX. Putting our attention back on this particular Air Jordan V, this tonal elephant print version is slated to be a Retro release for the second half of 2013 and features rampant use of the Air Jordan III-specific material on the upper, and in a rather creative move, on the outsole of the shoe. Light blue hints on the upper has also been noted on this 2013 Retro release. Here’s a re-done Air Jordan III by sneaker customizer 2012 Nike Basketball Shoes JWDanklefs, whose notable works include the Air Max Light ‘Homegrown’ and Air Max 90 ‘Stash’; in conjunction with this Saturday’s ‘Kickin’ it at the Border’ sneaker event in Laredo, TX, JWDanklefs uses the United States Border Patrol as the inspiration for this custom, using the Border Patrol Agent’s uniform-specific colors as well as the official patch logo on the tongue. When word first broke it was mistakenly pegged as this year’s Doernbecher Freestyle release, a word we corrected once official info came down that it was instead a model in the works for the second half of 2013. And after that we were pretty sure the model would be firmly tucked away until the calender flipped but nope, here we have it-the first real shots of the Air Jordan V with the all over elephant print coating. As you can see, the sneaks go the extra mile with a groundbreaking elephant print extending all the way to the icy soles.

Playbook By YoaKustoms Custom Nike Dunk High


PlayBook release on April 19, 2011 in Canada and the United States Playbook Custom Nike Dunk; in the United Kingdom and the Netherlands, June 16, 2011; [released on June 25, 2011 in the United Arab Emirates. Early products are good and bad reviews, praising the PlayBook's fluid UI, Adobe Flash support is based on the WebKit browser, HDMI output and multi-tasking ability. It has also been criticized because the PlayBook needs third-party e-mail and calendar applications to support BlackBerry native email and calendar applications. The platform also has a relatively small local third-party applications compared to other platforms. Mixed reviews, RIM's PlayBook 2012 Brass Monki Shoes has begun to gain traction, get better reviews, as the temporary issues are being solved. Wall Street Journal columnist Walter Mossberg writes: "I got the strong impression RIM is scrambling to the product to market." RIM Co-CEO (at the time), Jim Balsillie, Research refute criticism, and pointed out that more than 60 million units in the BlackBerry smartphone pairing the PlayBook. Bridge to access e-mail, calendar and contacts directly from the connection BlackBerry, PlayBook BlackBerry meet the same encryption standard. This is the first (September 2011, only one) FIPS 140-2 certification, which makes it eligible for U.S. federal government agencies use the tablet device. In addition, the Australian government also approved the use of PlayBook Tablet Custom Nike Dunk Bowser PC as the only meet its safety standards. , BBM still support via BlackBerry Bridge software that allows users to continue to access it, and the bridge to their BlackBerry smartphone.

Hello Kitty Custom Nike Dunk High Shiny Star

In 1999, a brutal murder is called the Hello Kitty's murder happened in Hong Kong Hello Kitty Nike Dunk Shiny Star. The fact that the murderer his victim's head inserted into a Hello Kitty doll, killed her popular name cases achieved. In August 2007, Thai police personnel with slight irregularities, such as appear late or in the wrong place to park, was forced to wear pink Hello Kitty's armband penance for a few days.
The 2007-2010 financial crisis period, Hello Kitty's prepaid debit card expanded to about 1 2012 Brass Monki Shoes meter long posters, display on the floor of the United States senate senator byron many root as a demonstration credit card companies use the method of extreme attract "age in 10 to 14 years old children". It was criticized for publicity website, encourage users "store, until you give up." Hello Kitty popularity in 2000 began in Japan before weakened gradually. In 2002, Hello Kitty's lost her a place as the best seller of Japanese character character database popularity chart, up to now recovering. In the 2010 survey, she was in the third place, behind the bread superman and PiKaQiu magic baby. In 2010, the New York times describes the characteristics of Hello Kitty for "don't have enough attraction, attracting numerous Nike Dunk Mid Mama Bear fans", and wrote, analysts say characterization of "weak". And they say hello Kitty no one to her successful TV animation character's mouth.

Minnie Mouse Womens Custom Nike Dunk High


The world's most famous mice. In 1928, the first in the world a sound animation "steamboat Willie" Mickey Mouse related fairy tale image (13 zhang) Mickey Mouse formal on screen, and into the entertainment industry Minnie Mouse Custom Nike Dunk. Mickey with its amiable, happy nature become children and family never mind the optimistic cartoon image and for people love and trust. Mickey is "m wonderful wonderful house" in the leading role, he encouraged his friend and audience in life to looking for the answer to the problem. Although mickey has variety of character, but he was every man's best friend. His charisma and friendly make him a wonderful wonderful man at the center of the house, and his kind and rich emotion makes him a history of the most popular cartoon image.
However, now, 2012 Brass Monki Shoes mickey has become more and more enterprise nearly several generation of young people's symbol is not a popular role, Disney was for the future to imagine his adventure step. First saw this will be next year to bring in a new video game, epic mickey, previous creak clean character can be a bad temper and cunning, and hero, because he went through a sinister wasteland. After repeated discussions and deliberate, originally just "plane" Mickey Mouse, in has the after personality, gradually "stereo" rise. He and his partner are hoping Mickey Mouse is a gentle kind, considerate, but also some impatience careless little one; He is a sense of righteousness, like help victim Nike Dunk Heels Modern Mickey of an injustice, often bite off more than one can chew, make oneself in danger; He is quite some tact, also very brave, so finally can always fall on one's legs; He still has naughty side, often like to joke, open some harmless little joke.

Angry Birds Custom Nike Dunk High Green Pigs


Halloween version plot title "to trick or surprise", and Christmas plot, entitled "season Greedings". In February 2011, Rovio release a new valentine's day angry bird Nike Dunk High Green pigs season update, titled "pig kiss", complete new subject level and graphics, and through the Facebook send angry bird "as the theme of the valentine's day information options. The main opponents of the king pig angry bird "series of games, as bad presumably leading his ambitious plans with his minions seize three unhatched eggs from the birds as food. Although he did not succeed inIn most cases, these birds capable of destroying his army and retrieve the eggs, the king pig was seriously injured, although he never quit. king pigs steal eggs again, rather than a simple escape from his a cheap cardboard silhouette bird's nest eggsbirds are not a vegetarian, this trick again pigs 2012 Brass Monki Shoes steal the eggs the second release of revenge and a cardboard cutout king pig used to divert the birds, however, king pig behind. Finally, birdsthe trick of the birds did not defeat him. Instead, they just destroyed the cardboard cutouts. finally found the true king of escape. pig king and his men stole the eggs, and a raft jungle city, Yunfei go. eggs ina bucket hanging below the raft. subsequent birds, pigs, jungle fighting pigs, birds Boomerang birds encountered, the bird was caught swine. saved him, he helped the birds failed oversized pig, retrieve the eggs.miniature pigs and destroy the fortress. Finally, Golden Pig is injured again, upside down bird after getting beat many times, pig king and his men kidnapped the entire flock of birds, to prevent birds beat them, and stole the eggs Brother birdwant to exact revenge on the pigs, the kidnapping of the other birds. during this period, the pigs trying to rebuild their fortress. quite anxious to destroy the fortress of Big Brother. then he Dunk Low Hello Kitty Red saw the boomerang bird was kidnapped again and release him. togetherfreed of their flock. Finally, Big Brother and the Boomerang capture king pig in a cage. although boomerang aside, Big Brother to beat individual pig boss.

2012 adidas Jeremy Scott Shoes


The 10th anniversary of the adidas Originals SoHo location brought with it the appearance of Cheap adidas Jeremy Scott Shoes Rocky and designer Jeremy Scott as part of the revelry. Those in attendance were treated to a lively in-store performance from the Harlem emcee – along with the appearance of several other A$AP Mob members and the aforementioned Scott – who befriended Rocky after sharing the cover of Complex Magazine. Unbearably cool, the men's adidas Originals Bear shoes by Jeremy Scott 2012 adidas Jeremy Scott Shoes[url] cross a pair of high-top shoes with a neon-bright teddy bear style that's made even more trippy with psychedelic flowers all over. There’s no better designer to ask to put a spin on a classic adidas silhouette than Jeremy Scott, whose bold Originals by Originals collaborations have been among the most ostentatious and polarizing in recent memory. His latest effort comes on the model most strongly associated with the Brand with the Three Stripes, a predictably bold take on the classic Shelltoe lowtop that reprises a theme of which we’ve seen a few examples since last year. The Jeremy Scott x adidas Originals [url=http://micharpeals.wordpress.com/2012/09/19/hello-kitty-2012-nike-shoes/]Hello Kitty 2012 Nike Shoes Superstar 80s ‘Ripple’ applies polka dots atop a crinkled leather upper whose texture and material carries over to the iconic rubber bumper.

Hello Kitty Womens Nike Dunk High Pink Blue


Hello Kitty's Furry Tale Theater is an Japanese-American co-produced animated series based on the popular Japanese character, Hello Kitty. Hello Kitty Womens Nike Dunk The series involved her and her friends doing their own version of popular fairy tales and stories. Each of the 13 half-hour episodes consisted of two 11-minute cartoons, for a total of 26 “shows”; each show was a spoof of a well-known fairy tale or movie. Each cartoon opens with the theater filling up with patrons, and usually a look at some comical goings-on backstage. The play then begins (with Hello Kitty saying “Once upon a meow”) and the stage transforms into whatever setting the story calls for (outer space, the American Old West, et cetera) 2012 Nike Hello Kitty Shoes. Each show is a lighthearted takeoff of a children’s story or a popular movie; subjects include Frankenstein, Crocodile Dundee, “Goldilocks,” and “How the Grinch Stole Christmas.” At the end, the stage returns to normal, and the actors take their bow. One exception to this format is the cartoon “The Phantom of the Theater,” which begins after the actors have finished a show; all the action in this story takes place backstage. The Adventures of Hello Kitty and Friends is a 3D CGI animated series featuring Hello Kitty and Nike Dunk High SB Papa Bear other characters from the Japanese company Sanrio. It was produced from 2006 onwards by Sanrio Digital and Dream Cortex distributed by Televisa. It consists of 52 episodes and deals with themes of happiness, family and friendship. It is intended for children between the ages of three to ten to watch with their family and friends. The series focuses on core values established more than 30 years ago by Sanrio such as: happiness, family values, friendship, and educational values.

adidas OBYO JS Wings 2.0 FLAMES Jeremy Scott


The next Jeremy Scott adidas OrbyO has surfaced – the third installment of his off the wall Spring 2011 Collection. Tailing the Teddy Bear adidas JS Wings 2.0 FLAMES Altitude Highs, the JS Flames clean up the frame while keeping that original Jeremy Scott artistic vibe. Using the JS Wings 2.0 as a base, the sneakers heat up the street with their flame thrower design. The Black leather upper is complimented by the gradient fire cut out, starting with Yellow at the toe and moving all the way through the wings, where it ends with Red. A new interpretation of the JS Wings model features a Hot Wheels-esque set of flames shooting through the back of the Cheap adidas Jeremy Scott Shoes sneakers. The upper is comprised of a gradient orange and yellow colorway. Second, we know you guys have had enough Jeremy Scott updates this week, and although we’re not making any promises, this should be the last dose of Jeremy Scott’s adidas sneakers for the week. The adidas Jeremy Scott Flames have started to arrive at adidas Originals retailers. It’s no doubt that Jeremy Scott’s adidas Originals by Originals collection is one of the most talked sneaker lines out right now. The JS Flames feature Orange to Yellow gradient leather uppers with Leaping Flames forming at the heel. Also, the sneaker comes complete with Black accents like on the Adidas stripes, bottoms, tongue, and more.
In addition to the Jeremy Scott adidas Wings Camo, the JS Wings 2.0 Flames is another neckbreaking design by Jeremy Scott. As we’ve mentioned in the past, the JS adidas is line definitely a big deal and we know some of our readers are fans of his work. Jeremy Scott apparently has free rein to do whatever he wants to adidas hightops, and boy is he not afraid to go crazy. His latest project, the JS Flames, are exactly what they sound like -- hot-rod inspired kicks with flames licking all the way off the back. Subtle is for other people.

Sonic The Hedgehog Nike Dunk Sneakers


Sonic the Hedgehog, trademarked Sonic The Hedgehog, is a title character and the protagonist of the Sonic the Hedgehog series released by Sega, 2012 Nike Sonic The Hedgehog Shoes as well as in numerous spin-off comics, cartoons, and a feature film. While many individuals at Sega had a hand in Sonic's creation, programmer Yuji Naka and artist Naoto ?shima are generally credited with the creation of the character, a blue 15-year-old anthropomorphic hedgehog, who has the ability to run at supersonic speeds and the ability to curl into a ball, primarily to attack enemies. This is a major part of the gameplay of the series. While Sega were seeking a flagship series to compete with Nintendo's Mario series along with a character to replace Alex Kidd as the company's mascot, several character designs were submitted by its AM8 research and Sonic The Hedgehog Nike Dunk Sneakers development department. Many results came forth from their experiments with character design, including an armadillo (who later developed into Mighty the Armadillo), a dog, a Theodore Roosevelt look-alike in pajamas, and a rabbit (who would use its extendible ears to collect objects, an aspect later incorporated in Ristar). Eventually, Naoto ?shima's spiky teal hedgehog, initially codenamed "Mr. Needlemouse", was chosen as the new mascot. Sonic's blue pigmentation was chosen to match Sega's cobalt blue logo, and his shoes were a concept evolved from a design inspired by Michael Jackson's boots with the addition of the color red, which was inspired by both Santa Claus and the contrast of those colors on Jackson's 1987 album Bad; his personality was based on Bill Clinton's "Get it done" attitude.

2012 Running Shoes


The Nike LunarGlide+ 4 Shield Men's 2012 Running Shoes offers the same LunarGlide ride runners love with the addition of dynamic Flywire for an adaptive, glove-like fit. It’s also water-resistant for protection during outdoor runs. The innovative upper and mesh inner sleeve of the Nike Air Max+ 2012 Men's Running Shoe add lightweight, flexible support and seamless comfort to a running favorite. The Nike Free Run+ 3 Shield Men's Running Shoe delivers a barefoot-like ride with the cushioning, traction and underfoot protection of a shoe, while weather resistance helps keep feet dry in wet conditions. Completely customizable from top to bottom, the Nike Free Run iD Running Sneakers On Sale lets you build exclusive hybrids of the Free 5.0 and Free 3.0 for personalized support, flexibility and cushioning. Choose the upper and midsole combination that meets the demands of your run, then choose from a wide-ranging color palette to create a look that’s truly your own. Lighter than its predecessor, the Nike Air Pegasus+ 29 Shield Men's Running Shoe offers the ultra-responsive cushioning that runners know and love, plus an enhanced, weather-resistant upper for targeted support and protection. The Nike Free 4.0 Men's Running Shoe is more flexible than the Nike Free Run+ 3 and more supportive than the Nike Free 3.0. Like those styles, it combines the feel of barefoot running with cushioning, traction and underfoot protection. The Nike LunarEclipse+ 2 Men's Running Shoe delivers a snug, adjustable fit, plush cushioning and stability without stiffness. The dynamic fit system features soft material "fingers" that wrap the midfoot and arch from under the foot and connect to the laces. They move with the foot as you run for a truly glove-like fit, reducing the space between foot and shoe for total comfort.

2012 Air Jordan 19 Shoes


Never before seen on a basketball shoe was a material called tech-flex. Air Jordan XIX (19) HistoryThis material is used in the automobile industry. Tech-flex is a material which can stretch, and since it is used on the Air Jordan XIX it gave your foot the comfort you need. A lot of this work took place in Nike’s Innovation Kitchen, even before the launch Cheap Air Jordans of the Air Jordan 18 (XVIII). The laceless design didn’t work out in the end, but the tech-flex stayed, providing a different take on the ongoing lace-cover look and providing additional, rather than primary, support. Underneath, rather than conventional laces, the shoe relied on thinner cables that strapped everything down via some decidedly functional lace locks. But then again, the XVI’s weren’t the most successful of Air Jordans. Of course, MJ wasn’t around to promote either of these sneakers in-game due to retirement, but this time it was for good. This white version of the 2012 Air Jordan 19 Shoes contains a patent leather toe and leather uppers. The lace-covering mesh is inspired by the Black Mamba snake. Either way, you can’t go worng with black and red. Although, the shoe is mostly black color from the patent leather toe box, to the leather uppers, to the suede straps. There are just a few minor red accents on the carbon fiber-plated outsole and other various places on the shoe. The shoes themselves showcase a patent leather toe, like all XIX’s, in black, while the rest of the leather uppers are white leather. The mesh, inspired by the Black Mamba snake, is also black, matching the patent leather. This shoe was the Midwest version of the XIX that released as part of a regional series. The rest of the uppers are white leather, while the lace-covering mesh is a see-through white. Some great qualities of the Air Jordan XIX is a carbon fiber shank plate, phylon midsole, full-length zoom air unit, patent leather toe box, tech-flex upper, Velcro heel strap and plastic lace-locks.

Nike Dunk High SB Premium Plum

The latest releases from nike sb are displaying the fall development of muted tones color tones to conventional bright colors. Examine out the Nike Dunk High SB Premium Plum, a type that requires its colorway from your 2001 dunk reduced expert b by the identical name, and a single that adds for the developing record of 2011 nike sb sneakers patterned soon after classic swoosh skateboarding colorways. But actually, the plum colorway utilized on this new nike sb dunk high arrives from your period just prior to nike sb was established, when in 2001 a dunk reduced expert b dropped on this unique tonal purple getup. Releasing alongside the nike sb dunk reduced gold dust in september is this pair of sb dunk highs.

The Nike Dunk High SB can be a throwback for the earlier dunk reduced plum since it is featured in an odd color mixture of plum, light purple and dark red. The referenced pair on this example actually predates the sb branch by about a year, so they could possibly be the very ideal redux especially once you carry into account the apparently deluxe suede in use on these beauties. The shoe is built from nubuck, and sports activities a two-tone design and style consisting of light and dark purple hues, that are contrasting by red-colored accents on the tongue tag, shoe laces, nike swoosh and outsole.
Selective placement on many panels with the shoe would make it cohesive visually, adding the bright lone to stability the shoe. This pair is surely among the nicest sb dunk highs how the manufacturer has provided up this year. Contrasting that complementary upper can be a bright midsole, completely finishing away the look. There’s been some speculation how the right away clear richness with the components could show a quickstrike release, and although which has however to be confirmed, they are certainly one thing special.

AC Vintage Nike Dunk High Dark Copper


Over the previous couple of years, nike has garnered plenty of interest on different lone factors for that Nike Dunk High. The blazer is not the only nike type getting vintage treatment. Quickly the dunk substantial ac would be accessible in 4 vintage colors: orange, blue, red, and yellow. Final year, nike incorporated the love/have stained lone on a amount of of its dunk releases, and in 2009, the manufacturer released the autoclave (ac) sole. The AC Vintage Nike Dunk is arranged to launch like a quickstrike up coming month, so maintain your vision peeled for that release. Quickstrike launch from nike sportswear known as "march madness", inspired through the ncaa basketball tournament. The most recent quickstrike releases pairs each of these factors onto a single silhouette. The sneaker combines the dunk using the blazer, and the result is actually a a fact aged college silhouette that?s hard to resist. Nike Air Max 1 Air Attack Pack Sport Red

If you ever wanted to grab a pair for Nike Air Max 1 Attack Red, it looks like now is the time. Nike is set to release the “œAir Attack” and it should quell all of your Air Max desires. Seen here in some bright colorways, the pack is set to release on April first and is available for pre-order. Each of the five pairs sports their own unique colorway. Two of the five use black as a base color and accent with purple or green laces and outsoles. A third pair sports a grey upper that is interrupted by red piping that matches the red laces and outsoles. Finally, the last two pair are completely monochromed from top to bottom in either a powder blue or red. The Air Attack Pack is days away from launch, and we’ve seen a number of sneaker styles and even some apparel from the pack already. Today we have a look at one of the most iconic sneakers ever created, the Nike Air Max 1. Originally created in 1987, the Nike Air Max 1 began as a groundbreaking technical running silhouette, and has since become somewhat of a cult classic in the sneaker culture. Five new colorways of the Nike Air Max 1 Shoes are included as part of the Air Attack Pack. As with the previous sneaker styles included in the pack, the Air Max 1 color combinations are very simple. That doesn’t mean you should overlook the details though, as each of the colorways combines a unique mix of materials, including canvas, synthetic leather, nylon, and nubuck materials. Two pairs utilize monochromatic designs, as Football Blue and Sport Red are slathered over every nook and cranny of each respective set. Sport Red makes a second appearance on the third pair, complementing Metallic Silver along the quarter panel and grey elsewhere. Finally, the fourth and fifth pairs mix materials on their black uppers, as the Club Purple-accented pair possesses a pony hair Swoosh, while patent and suede both appear on the final pair.

Nike Lebron 9 Shoes Red Black White


The Nike Lebron 9 is the ninth signature sneaker in the "King's" line. Designed by Jason Petrie, the Nike Lebron 9 Red Black White is the first basketball shoe that features the Flywire technology and Hyperfuse construction in one silhouette. “From the very beginning of the design process for the LeBron 9 we wanted to break the mold with a shoe that maximized the strengths of a triple threat player like LeBron,” said Jason Petrie, Nike Basketball Designer. “LeBron brings a rare combination of speed, agility and force to the game and my goal is to outfit him in a shoe that lets him do what he does best while maximizing our superior innovations.” The combination of both technologies gives the Nike LeBron 9 an extra dosage of breathability, durability and superior support. During last night’s game 1 Finals loss to the OKC Thunder, LeBron James rocked an all new colorway in the Nike LeBron Shoes. This player exclusive features an “away” color scheme, which consists of a predominantly red design that is contrasted with black and gold accents. Finishing off the look is an icy bottom. Dubbed the “Sex on South Beach” customs, the shoe utilizes the popular Nike LeBron 9 Elite as a base, adding plenty more pink and blue accents to the look, including plenty of speckled print. The mid-cut shoes are highlighted by the LED soles, while a red and black colorway works the upper. Touches of white are seen on the Nike swoosh and tongue signature, while 3M makes its way onto the shoe laces. it is my duty to let you know that this pair will be hitting most of you major sneaker outlets come Nike LeBron 9 Shoes. Focused on wolf grey, the model plays to several others colors, such as mint candy, new green, and pink flash. Consider yourself lucky if you got your hands on a pair of Nike Lebron 9 South Beach aka Miami Vice edition this past weekend. Prices have already inflated to over double if not triple!
